Subject: Fury
References: <9fmkjp+9pis@...> <3B1EFE31.5A28@...>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron pulled himself up, his fists were clenched very tightly, his
metal fingers could be heard straining against one another, with the
pressure he was putting on them. His eyes flared up, intensly shinning
on Unitron. "DON'T EVER CALL ME THAT. I AM MEGATRON" He began to yell.
"I AM PERFECTION. YOU ARE SCRAP METAL" he yelled again, taking aim with
his fusion cannon, and realeasing a beam of its furious energy first to
the right of Unitron, then to his left. THe beam ingulfed the ground
aroung him, and when the smoke cleared, he had two very large craters
beside him.
